casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Anthony DOVE 131P01-17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2019

Anthony Dove, For Dove, Anthony.

Sherri Horner Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, For State of NC.

Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, For State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of June 2019 by Defendant for Evidentiary Hearing:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2019."

Ervin, and Davis, J. recused
